# Copilot Instructions for safe-movie-search

- If requested, use the project requirements described in `README.md`.
- Generate Angular (v21) code with TypeScript, leveraging modern techniques.
- Use Angular CLI MCP for code generation quality and consistency, when applicable use the tools search_documention and get_best_practices.
- Use DaisyUI classes for styling; avoid custom CSS unless requirements demand it. 
- Use DaisyUI MCP for code generation quality and consistency.
